entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
